ygData.subject: RE: Abit bout the guild thing.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya ya, same opinion here.  Helping my RL friend to tat extend is personal decision, he been my games kakis since paper AD&D, hmm, tat s 16 yrs ago (know him
ygData.messageBody:
Ya ya, same opinion here. Helping my RL friend to tat extend is personal
decision, he been my games kakis since paper AD&D, hmm, tat's 16 yrs ago
(know him since kid time, neighbour, classmates, collegue, kakis, hehe)?

Anyway, when there is serious SOS msg, I will be helping also. :)

p/s: Same thing applies for me ;) But generally speaking, if others not
helpful, and when they seek SOS and I'm free, I still dun mind helping.
Just not to the extend tat I (or whole guild) must stop wat they are doing
and rush to the player. With guildsay, it's not very difficult to see who
is nearest and available to help ;) The purpose of forming our own kakis
is to help as and when we can. Unlike QHD so many faces I never seen b4,
if I can help, I help, if I'm not free, I won't bother also. But for own
kakis guild, I presume is small group of pple we know in RL or EQ, and have
trust with one another. Under this kinda situation, I'm more willing to
extend my help. If really no one online when a kakis SOS msg is send out,
I die die camp for 10 hrs liao will also rush to help. That's all I have
to say - all depending on situation ;) One good thing abt this lengthy
discussion is tat, by now I think all kakis know when to send a SOS msg
liao instead of abusing it ;)


On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 8:35 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> well... then i suggest u guys state the guild guidelines properly... then
> see how... becos i want a guild that whenever i need help (and i
seriously
> mean it) i wanna get some serious help... like i said... its not gonna be
> abused... that kid thing is a fucked up story... but if serious help is
> required ... someone must be there to help... that my minimum
> requirement.... if u just wanna have a guild for exploring then whats the
> point? can always form group and explore what....
>
> no body ask u to help your RL friend to that extend what... its you who
> wanna do that... i never say we MUST do that to all guild members... all
> shoud learn how to survive... as a guild... we should also do stuff
like...
>
> GIVE HIM A FISH, FEED HIM A DAY
> TEACH HIM TO FISH, FEED HIM FOR LIFE.
>
> if u get what im trying to say... enough said...
>
> Nicademous
> The 'supposed' to be evil Necromancer
> p/s: i never ever forget how i was saved by Garren when i needed help and
if
> he ever needs any (which is unlikely now, hehe), i'll do all i can to
help
> him out.... its just the same, if i needed help and no one fuck care bout
> helping me... then when im much higher level, u think i still wanna help
out
> thesame folks? guess not...
